content: Scusami ma non capisco... Thunderbird è un programma per gestire la posta, non offre caselle email ma ti permette di consultare quelle che hai presso un fornitore. Penso comunque che se hai impostato l'inoltro automatico della posta da Thunderbird, dovresti guardare tra i filtri: Tasto menu > Strumenti > Filtri messaggi
creator: @next

content:
Hola, Tienes 2 opciones: Abrir el árbol de conversaciones y elegir el correo que necesitas ver o no usar los hilos de conversaciones (esta configuracion se cambia haciendo clic en símbolo de árbol/hilos de conversaciones de la primera columna, si esta columna no se encuentra se puede agregar haciendo clic en símbolo de la ultima columna que es el editor de columnas)

Puedes indicarnos si tiene mas consultas o puedes cerrar la consulta actual eligiendo la respuesta útil. ¡Gracias!
creator: pcp04

content: Saved Passwords in Settings/Privacy & Security contains passwords and secure mail keys. I recommend removing all entries for the account in Saved Passwords, restarting TB, entering the secure mail key when asked for a password, and checking the box to store it in Saved Passwords. You might have to also enter the key the first time a message is sent.
creator: sfhowes

content: In Table View, right-click any column button and enable the Location column, and the Account column for a Unified folder.
creator: sfhowes

content: Are cookies accepted in TB Settings/Privacy & Security? If they aren't, the address isn't entered automatically in the OAuth window, and authentication won't complete, even if the address is entered manually.
creator: sfhowes

content: If you have the correct settings (smtp.mail.yahoo.com, port 465, SSL/TLS, OAuth2 authentication, User Name = email address), try with Windows running in safe mode, to test for interference by antivirus (especially if it's not Windows Security).
creator: sfhowes

content:
There are many possible sources of slow performance. It will take some troubleshooting to narrow the cause(s). I suggest you work through these steps:

https://wiki.mozilla.org/Thunderbird:Testing:Memory_Usage_Problems

You could also test with a new profile and one gmail IMAP account, in case you simply have a profile with too many hidden flaws. Help/Troubleshooting, about:profiles, to create and manage profiles. The current profile is unaffected.
creator: sfhowes

content: btw, when I log into my email online, these messages are not there. At least not the duplicates in this massive quantity.
